snippet: Prime Minister Ali Zeidan threatened to sink any foreign tankers attempting to load oil supplies from seized port terminals.
abstract: Libya's Prime Min Ali Zeidan threatens to sink any foreign tankers attempting to load oil supplies from seized port terminals, in a further escalation of tensions with the militias occupying Libya’s oil facilities.
lead_paragraph: Prime Minister Ali Zeidan threatened to sink any foreign tankers attempting to load oil supplies from seized port terminals.

headline.main: Libya Warns Oil Tankers Against Dealing With Militias
headline.print_headline: Libya Warns Oil Tankers on Dealing With Militias
